reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Secret Can Get Complicated
reviews.reviewText: Ava, a healer, killed a corrupt clan leader, Laird Patrick MacCarthy's father, who abused women. She was on the run, but went back to her home village to see her mother.Laird Patrick had stolen a shipment from Laird Callum's clan and Callum was attacking Patrick's soldiers at the same village where Ava's mother lived. Patrick and Callum fought each other and Callum won. Patrick said he would return the shipment, but Callum said it was not enough. Patrick offered any woman in the clan, pulling women out of the crowd, scaring the villagers. In the process, Patrick spied Ava and planned to torture and kill her to avenge his father's death.Callum said he wanted Ava to fulfill his debt and left Patrick looking bad if he did not agree. Ava did not like being a pawn, and Callum told her he would not force her, but staying in in Patrick's clan might be deadly, so Ava agreed.Then Callum had a great idea. His clan council members were pressuring him to find a wife every month and gave him a deadline. So he proposed a plan with Ava. If she pretended to be betrothed to him for a period of time, that would take the pressure off him for a while and he would in return bring Ava's mother and a friend of Ava to his clan and would give them enough money to live comfortably after they "broke up".The problem was they fell in love and Callum was afraid to marry because his father had set a fire that killed him and his wife and Callum was concerned that it would be a generational illness. His father had always been good to him and loved his wife, then suddenly this tragedy happened.There was a flaw in the story of his parent's death that was revealed later. I really enjoyed the book and the characters in it and highly recommend reading it!One problem was that

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Victim or Villain???
reviews.reviewText: I enjoyed the challenges and twists the story of Callum and Ava took, many unexpected. No spoilers but the hero is truly a hero and not the tortured madman he fears himself to be and Ava - well, she did really murder someone - but she also saved others in the process. The consequences of what they actually did and/or feared they would do keeps the reader guessing. There is a real twist at the end but Callum and Ava have their HEA after all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Deal You Hope That Succeeds
reviews.reviewText: The Highlanders Twisted Deal Book 4 of the series The Sinners Pub Eloise Madigan adds another Fascinating Tale to this collection. This time it is about a Healer with a secret that has her living in fear. Unable to practice her skills , she takes up something questionable ! Hiding in a disguise she goes back to see her Mother and best Friend. Only to be caught and then rescued by a Handsome Laird . He makes a Deal that changes everything ! There are many Twists and Turns , Emotions , Feelings, Deep Secrets, and possibilities of Love !Ava was a Healer. Her Mother trained her who was a MidWife . They were both very good and dedicated at what they did. Only Ava was on the run . Hiding from the Laird where she had been a Healer . If caught she would be dead.!Callum Laird McAdair was a Handsome Fierce Warrior. Well respected and liked by his Clan. He had apprehensions about his parents pasts. This lead him in not wanting a future of a wife and family.Ava and Callum meet when he rescues her from the Laird that wants to kill her. Making a deal to a fake betrothal. She doesn’t know his past that he won’t allow himself to admit or feel Love. This opens the story of them both fighting feelings . Coming together and pushing away ! Who will Win ? Who will lose ? Or Will they Both get what they want ?So Exciting and Emotionally Tugging ! Wishing for them both to have the Love and Happiness they deserve !A Read you will Feel !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Insanity and misinformation
reviews.reviewText: The two main characters are great. There is a wonderful twist in the story. The chemistry is there from the start only Callum is smart enough not to push a healer. Ava is full of surprises and knows her own mind and heart. Unfortunately Callum is stuck in his idea of madness being in his family. It’s a great read and enjoyable.The two main characters are great. There is a tragic twist in the story, but it explains everything. The chemistry is there from the start and only Callum is smart enough not to push a healer. Ava is full of surprises and knows her own mind and heart, which leads her to several misadventures. Unfortunately Callum is stuck in his idea of there being madness in his family. It’s a great read and very enjoyable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highlanders Twisted Deal
reviews.reviewText: Just read this historical romance novel and I loved it. Ava is a healer and gets herself in big trouble trying to avenge her best friend and has to flee her home. Sneaking home to see her mom whom she loves she gets caught up in a raid and is taken.This book was so good I couldn’t put it down, I finished it in one sitting. I love the way this author, Eloise Madigan, knows how to keep your interest and plan to read more of her books

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Well written story of the troubled path to love for Callum & Ava. They both wanted to love each other but felt that it was hopeless & nearly impossible. Especially for Callum it was hard to get passed his fears to admit his love & thereby hurting Ava. Their love conquered the obstacles. This was a story where you just knew the obvious villain was not the right one & could guess who it really was. The back story behind it all was very intriguing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Secrets, surprises and revelations blend together creating an entertaining story.
reviews.reviewText: An act born of desperation caused Ava to flee leaving behind life as she knew it. Despite the danger she faces she returns to her loved ones. Callum seeks justice from a rival clan leader, in the process he forges an arrangement that will alter the course of their lives. Secrets, surprises and revelations blend together creating an entertaining story.
Cullum rescued Ava from her old Laird. She is a healer and helps heal him both physically and emotionally. Callum appears fierce, but he is actually kind and honorable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Such a wonderful unexpected ending ,to a well written story. From the first chapter to the last. I highly recommend this amazing tale full of interesting characters. Th

Ava having had a dark past and would have been dead unless Laid Callum hadn’t come to her rescue. He tries to avoid her temptation as he couldn’t marry her. They have a fake betrothal but this don’t work that way. A great read. I received a ARC copy and leave a honest review. I recommend this book to other readers.
